channel.title: Making NPC's drop
channel.description: Hey guys, i really need help with my npc drops, since i got no npcdrop.cfg or anything im just wondering how do i make npcs drop?

item.title: Making NPC's drop
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

there is no drop.cfg

go into item2.java
and copy an existing drop pattern then rename it and add the items you want droped
now go into npchandler and scroll almost to the bottom find an existing drop pattern
rename the monster id and the new name for your drop pattern save+compile and your welcome

Read full topic
